Body:
g = codec.decode('(a / A)')
assert configure(g) == Tree(('a', [('/', 'A')]))
with pytest.raises(LayoutError):
    configure(g, top='A')
g = codec.decode('(a / A :consist-of (b / B))')
assert configure(g) == Tree(('a', [('/', 'A'), (':consist-of', ('b', [('/',
    'B')]))]))
assert configure(g, top='b') == Tree(('b', [('/', 'B'), (':consist', ('a',
    [('/', 'A')]))]))
amr_codec = PENMANCodec(model=amr_model)
g = amr_codec.decode('(a / A :consist-of (b / B))')
assert configure(g, model=amr_model) == Tree(('a', [('/', 'A'), (
    ':consist-of', ('b', [('/', 'B')]))]))
assert configure(g, top='b', model=amr_model) == Tree(('b', [('/', 'B'), (
    ':consist-of-of', ('a', [('/', 'A')]))]))
